title: Rename app to TickTockTask

requirements.text: Update the APP_NAME constant in `frontend/src/branding.ts` from its current value to 'TickTockTask'.
acceptanceCriteria: The APP_NAME constant in frontend/src/branding.ts is set to 'TickTockTask'.
All UI locations that reference APP_NAME display 'TickTockTask'.
The browser tab title (index.html or derived from APP_NAME) reflects 'TickTockTask'.

nonGoals: Changing any backend logic or data models.
Altering visual design, colors, or layout.
